About
Choffe

Choffe is a fictional coffee shop that pretended locating in Vancouver. The name Choffe stands for two of words - ‚ÄúChoco‚Äù and ‚ÄúCoffee‚Äù. We are passionate about serving the best waffles and coffee in town, using only the finest ingredients and brewing techniques. Our waffles are made fresh daily and can be customized with a variety of toppings to suit your taste buds.
